```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidycensus)
```

```{r}
pop_estimates <- get_estimates(geography = "state",
                               product = "components",
                               year = 2018,
                               geometry = TRUE,
                               shift_geo = TRUE,
                               output = "wide")
```

```{r}
names(pop_estimates) <- tolower(names$pop_estimates)

names(pop_estimates)
```
